p.s: The speech delivered by Sir David Frederick Attenborough as part of the opening ceremonies of COP26 in Glasgow in November 2021 and published on rev.com as well as YouTube deals with the issue of climate change and how we are able to solve it.
Attenborough says that in order to stop global warming, we have to reduce the concentration of carbon in the atmosphere.
We can do this by reducing carbon emissions as well as re-capturing carbon from the air.
He States that this is our responsibility because we, as humans, have caused the imbalance of ecosystems.
He also says that we can only reduce the concentration of carbon in the air by working together and actively taking measures against climate inequality.
He stresses the young people will be affected by the consequences of climate change what is stronger which is why are you taking action right now is very important.
